attributes.action: Michael Thompson, Brian Staniford, Alex Alexander, Ann Marie, John Clark, Margaret Sweeney, Lorraine Pearse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bring UK state pensions in line with Europe.     

There are one in five British pensioners living in poverty, and also many thousands of untimely deaths amoung our elderly people every winter due to meagre state pensions and ever higher utility bills.  

We want the Prime Minister to introduce a state pension increase for all British pensioners to 250 pounds a week, because means testing is not the way forward, a decent state pension on-a-par with Europe is.

rejection.details: Sorry, each petition must have a title so people know what it's about - you have simply added your names
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
